doc:
John Henry Faulk https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Henry_Faulk 0 John Faulk redirects here. For those of a similar name, see John Falk (disambiguation)John Henry Faulk (August 21, 1913 – April 9, 1990), from Austin, Texas, was a storyteller and radio show host. His successful lawsuit against the entertainment industry helped to bring an end to the Hollywood blacklist. John_Faulk redirects here . For those of a_similar_name , see John_Falk_(_disambiguation_)_John_Henry_Faulk_( August_21_,_1913 – April_9_,_1990_) , from Austin , Texas , was a_storyteller_and_radio show host . His_successful_lawsuit against the_entertainment_industry helped_to_bring an_end to the_Hollywood_blacklist .
